config - package config
This package contains configuration-related classes for the Real-Time Event Ticketing System.
config_loader() - Method in class config.Configuration
Loads configuration settings from a file, or asks the user to enter new settings if the file doesn't exist.

This class handles the configuration of the ticketing system.

Default constructor for the Configuration class.
core - package core
This package contains core components of the Real-Time Event Ticketing System.
Customer - Class in threads
A thread that removes tickets from the pool at a specific rate.

Creates a new Customer.
